document.full_text: the packbot robots sent in to the fukushima daiichi nuclear plant to measure radiation levels there were made by an american company, irobot, which also makes the roomba, a robot vacuum cleaner.
document.title: the lede: cousins of roomba deployed in japan
lines_and_colors: the packbot robots sent in to the fukushima daiichi nuclear plant to measure radiation levels there were made by an american company, irobot, which also makes the roomba, a robot vacuum cleaner.
